name: Under Cow-ver
description:
Your farm has not been producing very well, but you still need to bring something to the farmers market next week!

The only answer: Under the cover of night, steal the harvest from your neighbours! But beware, there are surveillance cows watching for intruders. If they catch you (and you don't have any food to bribe them), you'll be turned in.

Can you pull off the heist before dawn?

You can leave with your collected crops at any time before dawn arrives. Will you play it safe and leave with a little, or stay until the last second to harvest every single crop?

WASD or Arrows Keys to move.

Press "E" to steal crops.

Mouse to navigate menus.

All code and design, as well as the background music were made for Ludum Dare 52.

 - Sound effects and visuals came from other sources. -
